titleStmt.title: A brief answer to F. Bugg's Brief reply to the considerations humbly offered by the people call'd Quakers relating to the bill for restraining the licentiousness of the press.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Signed: "By G. Whitehead, and others concerned".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
